programme.title: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
programme.desc: Prem, a free-spirited boy, falls in love with a young girl Jenny. However, when he learns that she is in love with her college sweetheart, Rahul, Prem sacrifices his love and helps Jenny to get married to the love of her life.

programme.title: Dulaara
programme.desc: â€‹An innocent man living under the shadow of his late father's criminal past, Raja (Govinda) strives to prove his innocence and win back his lady love who believes him to be a murderer. Will he succeed in proving that he's being framed?

programme.title: Phullu
programme.desc: Phullu an uneducated man realises the inconveniences which women go through during menstruation and sets out to create awareness about the issue.

programme.title: Baatein Kahi Ankahi
programme.desc: Watch Baatein Kahi Ankahi with RJ Anmol In An Exclusive Interview With Bollywood Stars.

programme.title: Do Chor
programme.desc: While carrying out a heist, seasoned thief Tony comes across Sandhya who's stealing from the same man. He confronts her. A revelation and the ensuing escapades of the thievish duo paves way to a fun adventurous journey filled with romance and drama.

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta
programme.desc: Jai unintentionally kills the husband of a woman that he loves. When she gets diagnosed with amnesia, Jai comforts her and she falls in love with him. Now, guilt-ridden Jai is left in a dilemma whether to confess his guilt or reciprocate her love.

programme.title: Mann
programme.desc: Dev and Priya meet on a cruise ship and fall head over heels in love. They decide to sort out their previous betrothals and careers, and meet six months later. However, when Priya does not keep her end of the bargain, Dev is left heartbroken.

programme.title: Aankhen
programme.desc: When Vijay Singh Rajput is unceremoniously stripped of his duties as a bank manager, he decides to seek revenge by robbing the bank. To make the robbery untraceable, he trains three blind men to do the job for him.
